body_html:
please use https://discuss.pytorch.org for questions please.

v and x need to have the same shape in all dimensions except the dimension you are catting.

if x is of shape [1], it cant be catted with v of shape [1, 1, 4].
x has to be of shape [1, 1, N] where N can be any number to be concatenated with v in dim=2
body_text:
please use https://discuss.pytorch.org for questions please.
v and x need to have the same shape in all dimensions except the dimension you are catting.
if x is of shape [1], it cant be catted with v of shape [1, 1, 4].
x has to be of shape [1, 1, N] where N can be any number to be concatenated with v in dim=2
body:
please use https://discuss.pytorch.org for questions please.

`v` and `x` need to have the same shape in all dimensions except the dimension you are catting.

if `x` is of shape `[1]`, it cant be catted with `v` of shape `[1, 1, 4]`.
`x` has to be of shape `[1, 1, N]` where `N` can be any number to be concatenated with `v` in dim=2
